snippet: Natalia Osipova and Ivan Vasiliev, two dancers with the Mikhailovsky Theater in St. Petersburg, Russia, also happen to dance with American Ballet Theater.
abstract: Natalia Osipova and Ivan Vasiliev, two dancers with the Mikhailovsky Theater in St. Petersburg, Russia, also happen to dance with American Ballet Theater.

headline.main: American Ballet Theater Thwarts Mikhailovsky's Summer Plans
headline.print_headline: Two Russian Ballet Stars Won’t Dance at Lincoln Center
